name: Potato
description: Potatoes for south of tamriel, from the deep wood where it grows abundent. Thou baremost abundent, its hard to got. Thou thy got to pay high price for. Lots of people used to die to get this, now it became easier dur to the rise helpful wood elves

name: Golden Apple
description: Golden Apples from the mystical orchards of Avalon, known for their healing properties and divine taste. Only a few are harvested each year, making them a rare delicacy.

name: Crimson Berries
description: Crimson Berries are known for their vibrant color and potent flavor. Gathered from the depths of Bloodthorn Forest, they are a favorite among alchemists and chefs alike.

name: Moonlit Mushrooms
description: Moonlit Mushrooms glow faintly in the dark and are said to enhance one's connection to the lunar energies. Harvested during full moons, they are highly sought after by mystics.

name: Sunfire Peppers
description: Sunfire Peppers are incredibly spicy and are used in many fiery dishes. Grown in the Scorched Plains, they are a staple in the diets of those who can handle the heat.

name: Frostleaf Herbs
description: Frostleaf Herbs are known for their cooling properties and are often used in potions to reduce fever or inflammation. They are harvested from the highest peaks where the air is thinnest.

name: Thunderroot
description: Thunderroot is a rare root vegetable that is said to absorb the energy of thunderstorms. It is a key ingredient in many powerful elixirs and is highly valued by alchemists.

name: Shadowbloom Flowers
description: Shadowbloom Flowers only bloom under the light of a new moon. They are used in rituals to enhance one's stealth and are highly prized by rogues and assassins.

name: Starfall Nuts
description: Starfall Nuts are said to fall from the heavens during meteor showers. They are known for their rich, buttery flavor and are a favorite among bakers.

name: Emberfruit
description: Emberfruit grows near active volcanoes and is known for its fiery red color and spicy taste. It is often used in dishes that require a bold, intense flavor.

name: Whispering Wheat
description: Whispering Wheat is said to carry the secrets of the wind. It is a staple grain in many cultures and is known for its light, airy texture when baked.

name: Crystalized Honey
description: Crystalized Honey is harvested from the hives of radiant bees. It is known for its sweet, crystalline structure and is often used in desserts and healing potions.

name: Dragonfire Chili
description: Dragonfire Chili is one of the spiciest peppers known to exist. It is said that only those with the heart of a dragon can handle its intense heat.

name: Phoenix Feathers
description: Phoenix Feathers are rare and are said to carry the essence of rebirth. They are often used in high-level enchantments and are highly sought after by mages.

name: Obsidian Onions
description: Obsidian Onions are known for their dark, glossy skin and sharp flavor. They are a staple in many savory dishes and are believed to have protective properties.

name: Silverleaf Tea
description: Silverleaf Tea is made from the leaves of the silverleaf tree, known for its calming properties. It is a favorite among those who seek peace and tranquility.

name: Gilded Ginger
description: Gilded Ginger is a rare spice that adds a golden hue and a unique flavor to any dish. It is often used in celebratory feasts and is a symbol of prosperity.

name: Ebonwood Bark
description: Ebonwood Bark is known for its dark color and potent medicinal properties. It is often used in remedies for ailments of the mind and body.

name: Celestial Carrots
description: Celestial Carrots are said to be blessed by the stars. They are known for their sweet flavor and are often used in dishes that require a touch of magic.

name: Frosted Figs
description: Frosted Figs are a rare delicacy that only grow in the coldest regions. They are known for their icy exterior and sweet, juicy interior.

name: Inferno Peaches
description: Inferno Peaches are known for their fiery red color and spicy-sweet flavor. They are often used in dishes that require a bold, intense taste.

name: Mystic Mint
description: Mystic Mint is known for its refreshing flavor and magical properties. It is often used in potions and teas to enhance clarity and focus.

name: Radiant Radishes
description: Radiant Radishes are known for their bright color and crisp texture. They are a staple in many salads and are believed to bring joy to those who consume them.

name: Shadowed Spinach
description: Shadowed Spinach is known for its dark leaves and rich flavor. It is often used in dishes that require a deep, earthy taste.

name: Twilight Tomatoes
description: Twilight Tomatoes are known for their unique color and sweet flavor. They are often used in dishes that require a touch of elegance and mystery.

name: Verdant Vanilla
description: Verdant Vanilla is known for its rich aroma and flavor. It is often used in desserts and is a favorite among bakers and chefs.

name: Zephyr Zucchini
description: Zephyr Zucchini is known for its light, airy texture and mild flavor. It is often used in dishes that require a subtle, refreshing taste.

name: Aurora Apples
description: Aurora Apples are known for their vibrant colors and sweet, crisp flavor. They are often used in desserts and are a favorite among those who appreciate beauty in their food.

name: Blazing Basil
description: Blazing Basil is known for its spicy flavor and vibrant red color. It is often used in dishes that require a bold, intense taste.

name: Crimson Carrots
description: Crimson Carrots are known for their deep red color and sweet flavor. They are often used in dishes that require a touch of color and sweetness.

name: Dewdrop Dill
description: Dewdrop Dill is known for its fresh, tangy flavor and is often used in salads and sauces. It is a favorite among those who enjoy a burst of freshness in their meals.

name: Ethereal Eggplant
description: Ethereal Eggplant is known for its unique, almost translucent appearance and delicate flavor. It is often used in dishes that require a touch of elegance.

name: Frostfire Fennel
description: Frostfire Fennel is known for its unique combination of cooling and spicy flavors. It is often used in dishes that require a complex, layered taste.

name: Golden Grapes
description: Golden Grapes are known for their sweet, rich flavor and are often used in winemaking. They are a favorite among those who appreciate the finer things in life.

name: Harmony Herbs
description: Harmony Herbs are known for their calming properties and are often used in teas and potions. They are a favorite among those who seek balance and peace.

name: Infernal Ivy
description: Infernal Ivy is known for its fiery red leaves and spicy flavor. It is often used in dishes that require a bold, intense taste.

name: Jade Jasmine
description: Jade Jasmine is known for its delicate aroma and is often used in teas and perfumes. It is a favorite among those who appreciate subtle, refined scents.

name: Kaleidoscope Kale
description: Kaleidoscope Kale is known for its vibrant colors and crisp texture. It is often used in salads and is a favorite among health enthusiasts.

name: Lunar Lavender
description: Lunar Lavender is known for its calming properties and is often used in teas and potions. It is a favorite among those who seek peace and tranquility.

name: Mystic Marjoram
description: Mystic Marjoram is known for its unique flavor and is often used in dishes that require a touch of magic. It is a favorite among chefs and alchemists alike.

name: Nebula Nectarines
description: Nebula Nectarines are known for their sweet, juicy flavor and are often used in desserts. They are a favorite among those who appreciate the beauty of the stars.

name: Obsidian Oregano
description: Obsidian Oregano is known for its dark color and bold flavor. It is often used in dishes that require a deep, earthy taste.

name: Phoenix Peppers
description: Phoenix Peppers are known for their fiery red color and intense heat. They are often used in dishes that require a bold, spicy flavor.

name: Quicksilver Quinoa
description: Quicksilver Quinoa is known for its light, fluffy texture and is often used in salads and side dishes. It is a favorite among health-conscious individuals.

name: Radiant Rosemary
description: Radiant Rosemary is known for its vibrant aroma and is often used in dishes that require a touch of freshness. It is a favorite among chefs and home cooks alike.

name: Starlight Sage
description: Starlight Sage is known for its calming properties and is often used in teas and potions. It is a favorite among those who seek peace and tranquility.

name: Thunder Thyme
description: Thunder Thyme is known for its bold flavor and is often used in dishes that require a touch of intensity. It is a favorite among those who enjoy a robust taste.

name: Umbral Umeboshi
description: Umbral Umeboshi are known for their unique flavor and are often used in traditional dishes. They are a favorite among those who appreciate the art of preservation.
